data.comment: The big names in today's match at Easter Road have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 1, Greg Aitken awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Hibernian.
Hibernian awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, Free kick for Hibernian in the half of Motherwell.
Hibernian push forward at Easter Road and Daryl Horgan gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Motherwell defence.
Greg Aitken signals a free kick to Motherwell in their own half.
In the minute 6, Can Motherwell get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hibernian's half?
Corner awarded to Hibernian.
Motherwell drives forward and Callum Lang gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 8, Motherwell have been awarded a corner by Greg Aitken.
Throw-in for Motherwell in the half of Hibernian.
Throw-in high up the field for Hibernian in Edinburgh.
In the minute 11, Motherwell awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hibernian close to the penalty box.
Christian Doidge gets his shot on target but fails to score for Hibernian.
In the minute 13, Motherwell's David Turnbull gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hibernian defender.
Free kick for Hibernian in their own half.
Motherwell drive upfield and David Turnbull gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Hibernian defender.
In the minute 14, Greg Aitken signals a throw-in for Motherwell, close to Hibernian's area.
Kevin Nisbet for Hibernian gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Motherwell at Easter Road.
In the minute 16, Motherwell to take a throw-in in Hibernian territory.
Corner awarded to Motherwell.
Hibernian awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Motherwell have been awarded a corner by Greg Aitken.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Edinburgh.
In Edinburgh, Stephen O`Donnell of Motherwell is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 21, Corner awarded to Motherwell.
In Edinburgh Motherwell attack through Jordan White. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Hibernian goal kick.
In the minute 22, In Edinburgh a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Motherwell's Jordan White gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Hibernian have a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Free kick for Motherwell in their own half.
Greg Aitken signals a free kick to Motherwell.
Motherwell are coming forward and Sherwin Seedorf gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 25, Greg Aitken awards Hibernian a goal kick.
Motherwell will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Hibernian.
Free kick Hibernian.
In the minute 28, Greg Aitken signals a Hibernian throw-in in Motherwell's half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ricki Lamie for Motherwell who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Goal kick for Motherwell at Easter Road.
In the minute 30, Motherwellâ€™s Ricki Lamie is on his feet again at Easter Road.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Greg Aitken signals a Hibernian throw-in in Motherwell's half.
In the minute 31, Greg Aitken signals a free kick to Hibernian in their own half.
Greg Aitken awards Hibernian a goal kick.
In Edinburgh a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 33, Can Hibernian get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Motherwell's half?
Free kick for Motherwell in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Motherwell drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Jordan White (Motherwell) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Hibernian to take a throw-in in Motherwell territory.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Hibernian in the half of Motherwell.
Hibernian pushes forward through Martin Boyle, whose finish on goal is saved.
Kevin Nisbet (Hibernian) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 39, Hibernian have been awarded a corner by Greg Aitken.
Important block from the Motherwell defence as Josh Doig fires in a strike for Hibernian.
Hibernian have been awarded a corner by Greg Aitken.
In the minute 40, Hibernian's Christian Doidge misses with an attempt on goal.
Motherwell have a goal kick.
Greg Aitken signals a Hibernian throw-in in Motherwell's half.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Motherwell push forward at Easter Road and Allan Campbell gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Hibernian defence.
Greg Aitken blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Corner awarded to Motherwell.
Motherwell's Ricki Lamie breaks free at Easter Road. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 46, Ball goes out of play for a Hibernian goal kick.
Throw-in for Hibernian in their own half.
Motherwell awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Hibernian in the half of Motherwell.
Hibernian to take a throw-in in Motherwell territory.
Corner awarded to Motherwell.
In the minute 50, Greg Aitken signals a free kick to Hibernian in their own half.
Free kick for Hibernian in their own half.
Callum Lang (Motherwell) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 52, Motherwell have been awarded a corner by Greg Aitken.
Motherwell's Ricki Lamie gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Edinburgh.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Motherwell at Easter Road.
Steve Robinson (Motherwell) is making a first substitution, with Jermaine Hylton replacing Sherwin Seedorf.
Ball safe as Hibernian is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 56, The home team replace Joe Newell with Melker Hallberg.
Scott Allan is replacing Daryl Horgan for the home team.
Throw-in Hibernian.
In the minute 57, Hibernian awarded a free kick in their own half.
Greg Aitken awards Hibernian a goal kick.
Greg Aitken signals a free kick to Hibernian in their own half.
In the minute 59, Hibernian's Martin Boyle gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Motherwell defender.
Greg Aitken awards the away team a throw-in.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Stephen O`Donnell.
In the minute 62, Motherwell's Stephen O`Donnell looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Greg Aitken signals a free kick to Motherwell.
Declan Gallagher (Motherwell) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 63, Hibernian awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hibernian have been awarded a corner by Greg Aitken.
Can Motherwell get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hibernian's half?
In the minute 66, Free kick for Motherwell in the half of Hibernian.
Callum Lang for Motherwell gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Hibernian have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Hibernian are pushing forward but Martin Boyle's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Motherwell at Easter Road.
Greg Aitken signals a Hibernian throw-in in Motherwell's half.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Hibernian at Easter Road.
Corner awarded to Motherwell.
Free kick for Hibernian in their own half.
In the minute 72, Allan Campbell is booked for the away team.
Ball goes out of play for a Motherwell goal kick.
Motherwell make their second substitution with Tony Watt replacing Jordan White.
In the minute 73, Chris Long is replacing Callum Lang for Motherwell at Easter Road.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Hibernian in their own half.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the home team in Edinburgh.
Greg Aitken signals a free kick to Hibernian in their own half.
Melker Hallberg is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 79, Jack Ross is making the team's third substitution at Easter Road with Lewis Stevenson replacing Josh Doig.
Melker Hallberg for Hibernian is back on the field again.
Can Motherwell get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hibernian's half?
In the minute 82, Motherwell have been awarded a corner by Greg Aitken.
Motherwell's Jermaine Hylton breaks free at Easter Road. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Hibernian awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 84, Christian Doidge of Hibernian gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Edinburgh.
Corner awarded to Hibernian.
In the minute 86, Hibernian to take a throw-in in Motherwell territory.
Ball safe as Motherwell is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Motherwell.
In the minute 89, Stephen O`Donnell is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
David Turnbull (Motherwell) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Motherwell have been awarded a corner by Greg Aitken.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Hibernian awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hibernian awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Hibernian.
Liam Grimshaw for Motherwell is whistled offside.
Throw-in for Motherwell in the half of Hibernian.
Motherwell's Tony Watt gets in a shot on goal at Easter Road. But the effort is unsuccessful.
That's full-time at Easter Road. The final score is 0-0.
The away team has substituted Stephen O`Donnell with Liam Grimshaw. Steve Robinson is thus making his fourth change.
